  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: namespace PulkitJalan\Google\Services;
  4: 
  5: class Compute extends AbstractClient
  6: {
  7:     /**
  8:      * @var \Google_Service_Compute
  9:      */
 10:     protected $property;
 11: 
 12:     /**
 13:      * @var string
 14:      */
 15:     protected $defaultImageProject = 'ubuntu-os-cloud';
 16: 
 17:     /**
 18:      * @var string
 19:      */
 20:     protected $defaultImage = 'ubuntu-1404';
 21: 
 22:     /**
 23:      * $param \Google_Client $client
 24:      */
 25:     public function __construct(\Google_Client $client, array $config)
 26:     {
 27:         parent::__construct($client, $config);
 28: 
 29:         $this->property = new \Google_Service_Compute($this->client);
 30:     }
 31: 
 32:     /**
 33:      * Create an instance
 34:      *
 35:      * @param  array                            $params
 36:      * @return \Google_Service_Compute_Instance
 37:      */
 38:     public function createInstance(array $params)
 39:     {
 40:         $postBody = new \Google_Service_Compute_Instance();
 41:         $postBody->setName(array_get($params, 'name', $this->getRandomString()));
 42:         $postBody->setDescription(array_get($params, 'description'));
 43:         $postBody->setCanIpForward(array_get($params, 'forwardIp', false));
 44: 
 45:         $postBody->setMachineType($this->getMachineTypeLink(array_get($params, 'machineType', 'n1-standard-1')));
 46:         $postBody->setScheduling($this->getScheduling($params));
 47: 
 48:         // set boot disk
 49:         $postBody->setDisks($this->getAttachedDisk(array_merge(['boot' => true], array_get($params, 'disk'))));
 50: 
 51:         // set network interface, default without ip
 52:         $postBody->setNetworkInterfaces([$this->getNetworkInterface(array_get($params, 'network', []))]);
 53: 
 54:         // set metadata if provided
 55:         if (array_get($params, 'metadata')) {
 56:             $postBody->setMetadata($this->getMetaData(array_get($params, 'metadata')));
 57:         }
 58: 
 59:         // set tags if provided
 60:         if (array_get($params, 'tags')) {
 61:             $postBody->setTags($this->getTags(array_get($params, 'tags')));
 62:         }
 63: 
 64:         // create instance and return
 65:         return $this->property->instances->insert($this->getProject(), $this->getZone(), $postBody, array_get($params, 'opts', []));
 66:     }
 67: 
 68:     /**
 69:      * List instances
 70:      *
 71:      * @return \Google_Service_Compute_InstanceList
 72:      */
 73:     public function listInstances()
 74:     {
 75:         return $this->property->instances->listInstances($this->getProject(), $this->getZone());
 76:     }
 77: 
 78:     /**
 79:      * Get a disks
 80:      *
 81:      * @param  array                                $params
 82:      * @return \Google_Service_Compute_AttachedDisk
 83:      */
 84:     protected function getAttachedDisk(array $params)
 85:     {
 86:         $disk = new \Google_Service_Compute_AttachedDisk();
 87:         $disk->setBoot(array_get($params, 'boot', false));
 88:         $disk->setAutoDelete(array_get($params, 'auto_delete', true));
 89: 
 90:         if (array_get($params, 'boot', false)) {
 91:             $diskInit = new \Google_Service_Compute_AttachedDiskInitializeParams();
 92:             $diskInit->setDiskName(array_get($params, 'name'));
 93:             $diskInit->setDiskSizeGb(array_get($params, 'size', 10));
 94:             $diskInit->setDiskType($this->getDiskTypeLink(array_get($params, 'type', 'pd-standard')));
 95:             $diskInit->setSourceImage($this->getImageLink(array_get($params, 'image', $this->defaultImage)));
 96: 
 97:             $disk->setInitializeParams($diskInit);
 98:         }
 99: 
100:         return $disk;
101:     }
102: 
103:     /**
104:      * Get a network interface
105:      *
106:      * @param  array                                    $params
107:      * @return \Google_Service_Compute_NetworkInterface
108:      */
109:     protected function getNetworkInterface(array $params)
110:     {
111:         $networkInterface = new \Google_Service_Compute_NetworkInterface();
112:         $networkInterface->setNetwork($this->getNetworkLink());
113: 
114:         if (array_get($params, 'ip', false)) {
115:             $accessConfig = new \Google_Service_Compute_AccessConfig();
116: 
117:             // if ip field is an ipaddress use static ip
118:             if (filter_var(array_get($params, 'ip'), FILTER_VALIDATE_IP)) {
119:                 $accessConfig->setNatIP(array_get($params, 'ip'));
120:             }
121: 
122:             $networkInterface->setAccessConfigs([$accessConfig]);
123:         }
124: 
125:         return $networkInterface;
126:     }
127: 
128:     /**
129:      * Get instance metadata
130:      *
131:      * @param  array                            $params
132:      * @return \Google_Service_Compute_Metadata
133:      */
134:     protected function getMetaData(array $params)
135:     {
136:         $metaData = new \Google_Service_Compute_Metadata();
137:         $metaDataItems = [];
138:         foreach ((array) $params as $key => $value) {
139:             $item = new \Google_Service_Compute_MetadataItems();
140:             $item->setKey($key);
141:             $item->setValue($value);
142:             $metaDataItems[] = $item;
143:         }
144:         $metaData->setItems($metaDataItems);
145: 
146:         return $metaData;
147:     }
148: 
149:     /**
150:      * Get instance tags
151:      *
152:      * @param  array                        $params
153:      * @return \Google_Service_Compute_Tags
154:      */
155:     protected function getTags(array $params)
156:     {
157:         $tags = new \Google_Service_Compute_Tags();
158:         $tags->setItems($params);
159: 
160:         return $tags;
161:     }
162: 
163:     /**
164:      * Get instance scheduling
165:      *
166:      * @param  array                              $params
167:      * @return \Google_Service_Compute_Scheduling
168:      */
169:     protected function getScheduling(array $params)
170:     {
171:         $scheduling = new \Google_Service_Compute_Scheduling();
172:         $scheduling->setAutomaticRestart(array_get($params, 'auto_restart', true));
173:         $scheduling->setOnHostMaintenance(array_get($params, 'host_maintenance', 'migrate'));
174: 
175:         return $scheduling;
176:     }
177: 
178:     /**
179:      * Get link for disk type
180:      *
181:      * @param  string $diskType default: pd-standard
182:      * @return string
183:      */
184:     protected function getDiskTypeLink($diskType = 'pd-standard')
185:     {
186:         return 'https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/'.$this->getProject().'/zones/'.$this->getZone().'/diskTypes/'.$diskType;
187:     }
188: 
189:     /**
190:      * Get link for maching type
191:      *
192:      * @param  string $machineType default: n1-standard-1
193:      * @return string
194:      */
195:     protected function getMachineTypeLink($machineType = 'n1-standard-1')
196:     {
197:         return 'https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/'.$this->getProject().'/zones/'.$this->getZone().'/machineTypes/'.$machineType;
198:     }
199: 
200:     /**
201:      * Get link for project network
202:      *
203:      * @param  string $network
204:      * @return string
205:      */
206:     protected function getNetworkLink($network = 'default')
207:     {
208:         return 'https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/'.$this->getProject().'/global/networks/'.$network;
209:     }
210: 
211:     /**
212:      * Get link for image, first check current project
213:      * else defaults to default images project
214:      *
215:      * @param  string $image   default: ubuntu-1404
216:      * @param  string $project
217:      * @return string
218:      */
219:     protected function getImageLink($image = 'ubuntu-1404', $project = null)
220:     {
221:         $project = $project ?: $this->getProject();
222: 
223:         $images = $this->compute->images->listImages($project);
224:         foreach ((array) $images->getItems() as $item) {
225:             // ignore deprecated items
226:             if ($item->getDeprecated()) {
227:                 continue;
228:             }
229: 
230:             // check if name matches image
231:             if (str_contains($item->getName(), $image)) {
232:                 return $item->getSelfLink();
233:             }
234:         }
235: 
236:         // default to default image and default project
237:         return $this->getImageLink($this->defaultImage, $this->defaultImageProject);
238:     }
239: }
